resources.string: Your score is %1$d out of 100\n\nYou must have at least 70 out of 100 to win the game.

* There are 12 cards consisting of 6 different pictures.
 * You can open 2 cards each time.
 * If these two cards are the same then the cards match each other.
 * The game ends when all the cards match each other.
